mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.gbclient_id AS "gbclientId", a.type_id AS "typeId", a.price AS "price", a.realprice AS "realprice", a.connacts AS "connacts", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.description AS "description", a.title AS "title", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.deal_time AS "dealTime", a.status AS "status", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gb_sold( id, gbclient_id, type_id, price, realprice, connacts, mobile, description, title, create_time, deal_time, status, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{gbclientId}, #{typeId}, #{price}, #{realprice}, #{connacts}, #{mobile}, #{description}, #{title}, #{createTime}, #{dealTime}, #{status}, #{delFlag} )
